subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: A twice-deflected slap shot led to the goal by Mike Ribeiro that gave the Washington Capitals a 3-2 series lead and put the Rangers on the brink of elimination.
snippet: A twice-deflected slap shot led to the goal by Mike Ribeiro that gave the Washington Capitals a 3-2 series lead and put the Rangers on the brink of elimination.
